goal.ch: 氫能與燃料電池系統被視為一種具有潛力的潔淨能源，未來的氫能與燃料電池技術可與其他再生能源搭配，或應用於汽車、船艦與無人機等載具及備用電源、緊急電源與住宅熱電共生等定置型發電系統。本課程主要以介紹質子交換膜燃料電池為主，目標是讓學生了解燃料電池基礎的熱力學原理推導、電化學理論、操作機制、傳輸現象模型、性能量測原理、效能與效率評估方式、各關鍵組件之功用以及最新發展現況。學生在本門課程中將利用學術資料庫搜尋並閱讀最新發表之燃料電池期刊論文。
goal.en: The hydrogen energy and fuel cell system is considered a promising option for future clean energy sources. In the future, the hydrogen energy and fuel cells can be integrated with other renewable energy systems, or be applied in the vehicles, such as cars, ships and unmanned aerial vehicles, and the stationary power systems, such as backup power, emergency power and combined heat and power systems. In this course, the development of proton exchange membrane fuel cells (PEMFCs) is the focal subject. The object of this course is to introduce the basic thermodynamic derivation, electrochemical principles, working mechanism, transport phenomena models, principles of performance measurement, evaluation methods of performance and efficiency, the function of the key components for PEMFCs, and state of the art PEMFCs. Students are required to search and read latest journal papers from academic databases.

outline.ch: 本課程將教授包括氫能源特性與未來潛力、基本電化學理論，燃料電池工作原理、燃料電池分類、燃料電池元件、燃料電池堆設計、燃料電池系統整合、燃料電池應用、燃料電池檢測技術及燃料電池未來發展等主題，本課程預計講授Nernst Equation, Butler-Volmer Equation, 電化學阻抗、循環伏安、等效電路等燃料電池相關理論，並針對質子交換膜燃料電池介紹其設計、元件測試、性能評估與量測等知識，本課程亦會安排實體展示與電池實測等方式針對質子交換膜燃料電池做深入之介紹，並以期刊論文導讀方式針對特定燃料電池議題進行探討。
outline.en: In this course, several topics are planned to be introduced. The topics include characteristics and future potential of hydrogen energy, fundamental electrochemical theory, working principle of fuel cells, classification of fuel cells, fuel cell components, design of fuel cell stack, integration of fuel cell systems, application of fuel cells, diagnosis of fuel cells and future development of fuel cells. The fuel cell related theories, including Nernst Equation, Butler-Volmer Equation, electrochemical impedance spectroscopy, cyclic voltammetry, and equivalent circuit fitting are expected to be lectured. In addition, the proton exchange membrane fuel cell is planned to be further introduced via demonstration and testing. Moreover, it is planned to discuss specific fuel cell related topics via reading journal papers in this course.

textbook.ch:
textbook
1. 燃料電池, 第5版, 黃鎮江,2023 (全華圖書)
2. James Larminie and Andrew Dicks, “Fuel Cell Systems Explained”, 2nd Edition, John Wiley ＆ Sons, (2003).

Reference
1. Frano Barbir, “PEM Fuel Cells Theory and Practice“, by Frano Barbir, Elseview Academic Press, (2005)
2. O‘Hayre et al., “Fuel Cell Fundamentals, 2nd Ed.”, John Wiley ＆ Sons, (2009).
textbook.en:
textbook
1. 燃料電池, 第5版, 黃鎮江,2023 (全華圖書)
2. James Larminie and Andrew Dicks, “Fuel Cell Systems Explained”, 2nd Edition, John Wiley ＆ Sons, (2003).

Reference
1. Frano Barbir, “PEM Fuel Cells Theory and Practice“, by Frano Barbir, Elseview Academic Press, (2005)
2. O‘Hayre et al., “Fuel Cell Fundamentals, 2nd Ed.”, John Wiley ＆ Sons, (2009).

gradMethod.ch:
1.期中考#1                     25％
2.期中考#2                     25％
3.期末報告(書面)            30％
4.作業(2-5次)                 10％
5.出席紀錄與課堂參與   10％
